section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on February 16, 2022. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Wage replacement.

codify:insert.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on February 4, 2022.*

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of COVID-19 Response Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-247, Mar. 17, 2020, 67 DCR 3093).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-328, June 8, 2020, 67 DCR 7598).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of Coronavirus Support Second Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-405, Aug. 19, 2020, 67 DCR 10235).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of Coronavirus Support Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-130, Oct. 9, 2020, 67 DCR 8622).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-30, Mar. 17, 2021, 68 DCR 003101).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-96, June 7, 2021, 68 DCR 006025).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of Coronavirus Support Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-9, June 24, 2021, 68 DCR 004824).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 3(a) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-125, July 24, 2021, 68 DCR 007342).

annotation.cite: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see §3(a) of the Recess Reprogramming Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-158, Aug. 5, 2020, 0 DCR 0)

annotations.annotation: For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 3(a) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-39, Oct. 27, 2021, 68 DCR 009487).

annotation.cite: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see §3(a) of the Recess Reprogramming Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-158, Aug. 5, 2020, 0 DCR 0)

annotations.annotation: Section 1002(b) of D.C. Law 24-7 (as amended by section 2 of D.C. Act 24-210) provided that this section shall not apply after September 4, 2021.

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 1002(b) of Coronavirus Unemployment Compensation Provisions Sunset Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-210, Nov. 18, 2021, 68 DCR 012361).
